text:
Jithender (24) from Jarkhand drowned in a pond at Putheri near here on Sunday night.

He was working in an orchard in Paraliar area near Boothapandi. He consumed liquor along with three of his friends and boarded a bus for Kadukkarai from Anna Bus stand on Sunday night. It was alleged that Jithender was forced to get out of a bus by the conductor, when he had started quarrelling with fellow passengers near Putheri. Jithender who got down went to the pond for bathing but drowned.

The body was retrieved by the police and sent for post mortem. Vadaseri police registered a case.
title: Man drowns in pond
